value.title: Make your Power BI report POP with a custom background
value.excerpt: Is your report plain or bland? Patrick shows you how you can easily make your Power BI report pop with a custom background. It's as easy as just getting PowerPoint and drawing some shapes.  Demo files: https://guyinacu.be/demofiles  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --

value.title: Merging your data in a modern lakehouse data warehouse
value.excerpt: Learn how you can move your data through different tiers using MERGE either with pySpark or SQL in Azure Synapse Analytics. Stijn Wynants walks you through the different steps.  Stijn Wynants https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  pyspark.sql.SparkSession.createDataFrame https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.SparkSession.createDataFrame.html

value.title: Power BI: Build a custom KPI scorecard

value.title: Power BI Tutorial | From Flat File To Data Model
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to load data from a flat file to the data model. This could be a text, csv or excel file with a lot of columns. Don't just pull it into Power BI. Take time to structure your data in your data model. From flat file to data model is basic concept, but is

value.title: Slicers vs. Slicer Pane vs. Filter Pane! Which is faster?
value.excerpt: You have different options in Power BI when it comes to slicers and filters. Just put the slicer on the report, use a slicer panel or have them in the filter pane. But which one is faster??? Patrick explores a few scenarios to think about!  Should you hide the filter pane in Power BI? https://greyskullanalytics.com/should-you-hide-the-filter-pane-in-power-bi/

value.title: What is this delta lake thing?
value.excerpt: You may be using a lake for your data and it may just be regular parquet files. In this video, Stijn joins us to explain why you should be using a delta lake instead and how this works in Azure Synapse Analytics.  Connect with Stijn https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  What is Delta Lake https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-what-is-delta-lake

value.title: Specifying multiple filter conditions in CALCULATE
value.excerpt: The filter arguments in CALCULATE can reference multiple columns from the same table in a single predicate: This is possible since March 2021 in Power BI, before that it was possible to filter a single column reference.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705207?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt
